Find-a-walk
Search our database of walks by choosing as many of the criteria below as you wish. Select how you wish to sort the walks, and then all the walks found matching your requirements will be listed below and their locations indicated on a map.
           
        
        
		
            



Grade



        
   
   1   

        
   
   2   

        
   
   3   

        
   
   4   

        
   
   5   
Grade 1 is the easiest; 5 is a hard scramble. Include as many grades as you like.




            
        
        


            


Distance







Minkm, max km. Fill in both boxes with the minimum and maximum distance.





            
        
        



            



Region



   

Select all the region(s) in which you wish to find walks. Check/Uncheck all

metres of ascent, Max: metres of ascent.

Walks with a bog factor 1 are often dry underfoot; 5 could need a snorkel!
